subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Juan Mauricio Soler Hernandez, a 24-year-old Colombian, became the second Tour de France rookie to win a stage in  three days of racing, winning the difficult mountain route by 38 seconds.
snippet: Juan Mauricio Soler Hernandez, a 24-year-old Colombian, became the second Tour de France rookie to win a stage in  three days of racing, winning the difficult mountain route by 38 seconds.
